description.value: A moment of observation tells you everything you need to know. Knowledge, as they say, is half the battle. The other half is hitting them where it hurts.

system.benefits:
As 1 [Combat] action, make a Wisdom + [[/check skill=perception]] opposed by target's Wisdom + Deception.

  • 1 success: learn its current HP range (Healthy 75%+/Bloodied 25-75%/Critical <25%), highest attribute, and any damage resistances or immunities.
  • 2 successes: your next attack against it this combat subtracts 1 from one die (your choice)
